title: Ritoto the Jungle Boy (Champion Concept)
body:
I couldn't get back to sleep this morning thinking about some different uses in game changing abilities, here are my ideas.

I was thinking of a Support champion, but he can be used in Jungle and Top possibly, maybe even Mid, ADC would be hard since he is melee.

**The Character** (There is no child boy champion, where is he, what is he doing with his life)

_**Ritoto the Jungle Boy**_ (you get it, RITO TWO! or you could pronounce it Japanese like)
A child born in the wildness of the jungle, he had to fend for himself with nothing but a can do attitude and a mystical staff that does melee damage.

**Base Stats:**
HP 580 +90 HPregen 6/5sec +1
MP 300 +40 MPregen 4/5sec +0.75
AD 60 +5
Atk Speed 0.68 +0.015
Armor 26 +4
MR 38 +1
Speed 350
Range 150

Reasons for base stats.
Much tank, high base speed as the champion does not gain any movement based bonuses.

The Passive: (Team work is great, but what if your team member isn't around, you shouldn't have to suffer)
It's tough to think of a passive that isn't being used. so lets say you and chosen allied champion that are near (1000 units) you both gain gain 1 per level plus 10% of your Armor and MR. If chosen allied champion is not near you gain 2 per level plus 2% of your Attack and Ability Power.

**Abilities (the fun stuff)**

**1st Ability: **
Cooldown: 6
Mana Cost: 100
A short (about the length of a ranged auto attack) straight line attack that hits all enemy champions and minions dealing 2/3/4/5/6% (+1% AP/+5% AD damage) physical damage, you gain vision of enemy champion for 4 seconds. After 2 seconds all that were hit are stunned for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds.

This gives you the caster to chase after and engage a champion, but of course it has some down sides like its short range and 2 second warning before it stuns. But of course a 1 second stun you can do a lot of damage in that time either solo or with a team mate.

**2nd Ability: **
Cooldown: 15/14/13/12/11
I think it's  a bit of a game changer myself. Ritoto jumps/blinks to a target location dealing 30/45/60/75/90/105(+70%AP +20%AD) magic damage in a small area, stealing Health. In the next 2 seconds the player can press the button to go back to location, doing the same damage.

So you can cast this twice, and get yourself healed. Pretty OP if you ask me =3

**3rd Ability: **
Cooldown: 12
Mana Cost: 80/85/90/95/100
Passive: Taking damage doubles your passive for 5 seconds (30 second cooldown).
Active: Ritoto is invisible for 3 seconds if you stand still. You can cast abilities and deal damage and still be invisible.

Why I couldn't sleep because it hasn't been used like this before so I thought it was a kind of epic idea. You are invisible yet can do so much damage while being untargetable. You can still take damage from skill shots though.

The Passive is there for those with skillshots trying to hit you, you can do all sorts of fun stuff with the plays.

**4th Ability:**
Cooldown: 140/120/100
Mana Cost: 100
It's a bit different from a normal one. Channeling for 5 seconds. The first 4 seconds it's 3/5/7 (+1%AP) percent health magic damage then 100/130/160 (+80% AP, +80%AD) pysical damage on the last hit. Which is about 1/3 to 1/2 health. This is dealt to surrounding champions in a 1000 units range and each allied champion will gain a 1 second shield equal to the amount of damage dealt per second to you and each allied champion within ult range.

I don't know if this is OP or not, but basically I wanted something that can slowly shred tanks and then burst to take care of both tanks and squishies that are low. Then throw in some shields for you and allies as a support mechanic.
